glsa.title: Tk: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in Tk.

background.p: Tk is a toolkit for creating graphical user interfaces.

description.p: Reinhard Max discovered a boundary error in Tk when processing an interlaced GIF with two frames where the second is smaller than the first one.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted GIF image with a Tk-based software, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Tk users should upgrade to the latest version:
